title: Why Bitcoin's Rally Has Room to Run This Month
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s record rally appears durable, as on-chain data and derivatives point to restrained selling and steady institutional confidence.

title: Binance Japan、PayPayと資本業務提携契約を締結　PayPayマネーによる仮想通貨購入サービスを検討
contentSnippet: 日本のキャッシュレス決済最大手PayPayが、世界最大手暗号資産（仮想通貨）取引所バイナンスジャパンの筆頭株主に。40%の株式取得により資本業務提携を実現し、PayPayマネーで仮想通貨を購入・売却できる新サービスを展開予定。7000万人のユーザー基盤と世界2.9億人のBinanceネットワークが融合し、日本のデジタル金融に革命をもたらす提携内容とは。

title: Uganda launches CBDC pilot as Kenya’s crypto bill passes final hurdle
contentSnippet: Uganda’s CBDC, a digitized version of the Ugandan shilling, has been deployed on a permissioned blockchain and backed by Ugandan treasury bonds.

title: Bitwise ‘not playing’ as it proposes low fee for its Solana ETF
contentSnippet: Bitwise is seemingly already moving to undercut other issuers with its Solana Staking ETF, proposing an annual fee of just 0.20%.

title: Bitcoiners are in profit, but beware of short-term fragility: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s massive gains amid a surge in Bitcoin ETF inflows are signalling strong demand, but analysts warn that rising leverage introduces short-term risks.

title: XRP Rejected at $2.93, Tests $2.85 Support After Failed Breakout
contentSnippet: A fresh supply zone formed at $2.92–$2.93, while the $2.85 floor is now under scrutiny as macro headwinds weigh on flows.

title: BitMine stocks trade choppy after Kerrisdale short seller report
contentSnippet: BitMine stock saw major swings after the Ether treasury firm caught the ire of short seller Kerrisdale, which issued a scathing report on the company.

title: DOGE Rejected at $0.26, Slides 2% as Profit-Taking Hits
contentSnippet: On-chain flows show large holders adding 30M tokens (approximately $8M), suggesting accumulation remains intact even as resistance caps upside momentum.

title: ソラナDEXジュピター、独自ステーブルコイン「JupUSD」発行へ　エセナと提携
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナ最大のDEXアグリゲーター「ジュピター」が独自ステーブルコイン「JupUSD」を2025年中にローンチ予定だ。エセナと提携しUSDtbを担保に採用するとしている。

title: Gemini Expands Operations in Australia with AUSTRAC Registration
contentSnippet: Gemini's Australia arm is now registered with AUSTRAC.

title: Zcash Extends October Rally: What's Driving the Surge?
contentSnippet: Zcash has surged more than 140% in two weeks to a three-year high, lifted by new institutional access and high-profile endorsements.

title: Here’s the real reason the 4-year Bitcoin cycle is dead: Arthur Hayes
contentSnippet: BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes argued Bitcoin cycles are driven by monetary policy rather than timing, and something’s very different this time around.

title: BNB mindshare spikes 251% in a week, as markets eye low-cost  chains
contentSnippet: Rachael Lucas, an analyst at BTC Markets, noted that BNB‘s recent surge highlights growing investor confidence in its long-term prospects.

title: Bitwise and 21Shares Add Staking, Slash Fees in Latest Solana and Ethereum ETF Filings
contentSnippet: New filings from the two crypto ETF issuers suggest that U.S. crypto funds are moving beyond simple price exposure.

title: ビットコイン高止まり、過去最高水準の機関投資家需要とBNBミーム熱が市場牽引
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨市場で2つの大きな動きが確認された。1. ビットコインETFへの資金流入が過去最高水準に到達、大手金融機関の配分解禁で機関需要が加速。2. バイナンスのBNBチェーンのミームコイン市場が急拡大、10万人超の新規トレーダーが流入し取引量8200万ドル超え。最新市況を分析。

title: Bitcoin set for ‘dramatic’ surge if it doesn’t top soon: Peter Brandt
contentSnippet: If Bitcoin deviates from its four-year cycle, it’ll see “dramatic” price action, according to veteran trader Peter Brandt.

title: Superteam Japan、ナスダック上場DFDVと提携　日本でのソラナ特化トレジャリー事業展開へ
contentSnippet: Superteam Japanがナスダック上場のDFDVと提携し、日本初のソラナ特化トレジャリー事業「DFDV JP」の立ち上げを目指す。韓国に続くアジア2例目の展開で、日本の投資家にソラナ成長への参加機会を提供する。

title: 仮想通貨SOSOのエアドロップ戦略｜SoSoValueの特徴やインデックストークンについて解説
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨SOSOのエアドロップ獲得のポイントを解説。SoSoValueの特徴から、報酬モデル、リスク管理まで網羅。価格情報や今後の展望も。

title: SOL’s next stop could be $300: 3 forces shaping Solana’s next major rally
contentSnippet: SOL’s bull case is supported by a rising TVL and DEX activity, along with strong institutional demand and investors’ hope for spot ETF approvals.

title: Bitcoin looks far from overbought as ‘stars are aligned’ for ETF surge
contentSnippet: Bitwise’s Matt Hougan predicts Bitcoin ETF inflows will hit a record in Q4, as analysts say Bitcoin still has room to run despite recently hitting a peak.

title: UK lifts ban on crypto exchange-traded notes as ‘market has evolved’
contentSnippet: The UK has lifted its four-year ban on crypto exchange-traded notes, with analysts predicting the move could grow the UK crypto market by 20%.

title: Linea（リネア）とは？SWIFTに選ばれる理由・報酬プログラムの始め方
contentSnippet: 世界11,000の金融機関を結ぶSWIFTがパイロット採用したLinea。TVL16億ドル、85%エコシステム配分の理由とは？メタマスク報酬3,000万ドル、Ignition10億トークンの獲得方法を解説。

title: 「2025年4QはビットコインETFに記録的な資金が流入」Bitwiseが予測
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨運用企業Bitwiseの最高投資責任者は、2025年4QにビットコインのETFに記録的な資金が流入すると同社が予測していると公表。要因を3つ挙げている。

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Bitcoin Climbs Through the Fog as Analysts Split on What’s Driving It
contentSnippet: Trading near $123,000, Bitcoin’s rise has become a mirror for the market’s uncertainty, part trust and part froth, with QCP calling it a “credibility hedge” while Glassnode and CryptoQuant debate whet

title: The Decentralized Map Paying for Data That Google Uses for Free
contentSnippet: OpenLedger’s latest addition of Sensemap to its on-chain AI ecosystem rewards users for verified real-world data, but can it compete?

title: CZ氏率いるYZiラボ、BNB開発者支援で1,500億円のファンド設立　ミームコイン取引も活発
contentSnippet: バイナンス前CEOのCZ氏率いるYZiラボが、10億ドル規模のBNBチェーン開発者支援ファンドを発表した。仮想通貨BNBは急上昇しており、ミームコイン取引も活発化している。

title: メタマスク、仮想通貨の永続契約取引機能をローンチ　予測市場ポリマーケットへの対応計画も
contentSnippet: イーサリアムなどのブロックチェーンに対応する仮想通貨ウォレットのメタマスクは永続契約取引機能をローンチしたと発表。ポリマーケットへの対応計画や報酬プログラムについても説明した。

title: Bank of North Dakota Taps Fiserv to Launch State-Backed 'Roughrider Coin'
contentSnippet: North Dakota's stablecoin endeavour follows Wyoming’s Frontier Stable Token as more states test blockchain-based money.

title: Jack Dorsey's Square Unveils Bitcoin Payments, Wallet for Retailers
contentSnippet: Block's Square has debuted a new product allowing merchants to accept Bitcoin and convert sales into the cryptocurrency.

title: ‘Don’t be Stupid’: Why Grant Cardone Says Bitcoiners Shouldn’t Chase Gold’s Historic Rally
contentSnippet: The real estate investor sees long-term challenges to gold’s scarcity.

title: Gemini Expands Australia Push as New Crypto Rules Loom
contentSnippet: Gemini is enabling direct Australian dollar trading as it positions a deeper commitment to the market ahead of stricter regulatory oversight.

title: Most US Growth Now Rides on AI—And Economists Suspect a Bubble
contentSnippet: A Harvard economist says 92% of U.S. growth now comes from AI spending. The Bank of England says we’re one “pop” away from pain.

title: Pantera Backs TransCrypts with $15M Seed Round to Expand Blockchain Identity Platform
contentSnippet: The funds will be used to expand the company’s credential verification system beyond employment into healthcare and education.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $123K as Miners Rally; VanEck Sees $644K BTC Amid Gold Gains
contentSnippet: The gold rally may need to cool before bitcoin could really gain momentum, suggested another analyst.

title: U.S. Senators Get 250K Letters Calling for Protection of Stablecoin Yields
contentSnippet: Stand With Crypto encouraged the messaging from its massive online list of advocates, asking the lawmakers to leave the GENIUS Act alone.

title: Shayne Coplan Becomes Youngest Self-Made Billionaire After Polymarket's $2B Investment: BBG
contentSnippet: Shayne Coplan’s net worth reportedly passed $1 billion after the New York Stock Exchange's owner valued Polymarket at $8 billion.

title: Polymarket CEO Shayne Coplan Is Youngest ‘Self-Made Billionaire,’ Bloomberg Says
contentSnippet: Polymarket’s CEO Shayne Coplan has entered the billionaire club—alongside Changpeng “CZ” Zhao, Michael Saylor, and Satoshi Nakamoto.

title: Square Launches Bitcoin Payment Tools for Small Businesses
contentSnippet: The features allow U.S. sellers to accept BTC, convert fiat sales automatically and manage crypto alongside traditional finances.

title: Hyperliquid Lists MON-USD Perpetuals Ahead of Hotly Anticipated Monad Airdrop
contentSnippet: Both Hyperliquid’s announcement and Monad’s recent posts suggest that an airdrop may be imminent.

title: ビットフライヤー、「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱い開始　メイカーダオ後継トークン
contentSnippet: bitFlyerは、メイカーダオ（MakerDAO）の後継トークン「スカイ（SKY）」の取扱いを開始。取扱記念キャンペーンも実施し、販売所での購入が可能となった。
